name: Phil the Pill
blurb: A perfectly blended top down action/puzzle video game that will make you laugh, cry and potentially bang your head against a wall.

rewards.reward: SOMETHING'S COOKING TIER-\r\nReceive an exclusive set of Phil The Pill wallpapers for desktop and mobile devices. Additionally, we\u2019ll notify you when the game is released (both iOS and Android versions) and invite you to download it for absolutely FREE!

TAKE A BOW TIER-\r\nNot only will we thank you for your support, we\u2019ll ask the whole world to do the same by adding your name to the game credits! You\u2019ll be famous and infamous! (tier one rewards included)

PRE-DUMP TIER-\r\nUpon successful completion of this campaign, you\u2019ll receive a pre-launch preview of Phil The Pill and exclusive access to our super secret development forum.  As a member of our forum you are invited to share your ideas to help us finalize development of the game.  This early preview includes the games first two worlds (54 levels) on either Mac or PC platforms. (first 2 tier rewards included)

TREASURE MAP TIER - Pieces of Crud are hidden in various nooks and crannies all over Pillville. This digital treasure map shows you where to find each and every piece of crud to give you a leg up on the competition! Each time you find one, massive bonuses will be rewarded. Bonuses will allow you to upgrade Phil faster and get many more power-ups on your quest to save Pillville. (First 3 tier rewards included)

ON THE WALL TIER-\r\nTime to take your home decor to a whole new level!  Get an exclusive full color Backer\u2019s Only Phil the Pill wall poster mailed to you shortly after the completion of this campaign! (First 3 tiers rewards included)

COVER-UP! TIER-\r\nGet a professionally screen-printed Phil the Pill T-Shirt. After the campaign ends, we'll send a survey to choose the color, design, cut (guy/girl) and size of your shirt. (First 3 tiers rewards included)

NAME A POLY TIER-\r\nFinally, you get to name a Roly Poly!  Each Pillbug saved by Phil will have his/her name featured in the credits.  Here\u2019s your chance to name that bug! (First 3 tiers rewards included)

SAVE A PILL BUG TIER-\r\nGet your very own limited edition frightened pill bug figurine. Figures are being formed on our Formlabs 3D printer (got it on Kickstarter!) These bugs are primer painted, approximately 1.5" diameter and make amazing desk companions. (First 3 tiers rewards included)

SAVE A PILL BUG (FULL COLOR) TIER- \r\n\r\nGet your very own limited edition FULL COLOR frightened pill bug figurine. These figures will be meticulously hand painted right here at our studio. A little bit more awesome than the primer version because everything\u2019s a little more awesome in color. (First 3 tiers rewards included)

CREATE SOME CRUD TIER-\r\nSend us a picture, sketch or verbal description for a piece of Pillville Crud (ie: totally random bonus items hidden throughout the game) and we\u2019ll illustrate it, include it in the game and send to you a high resolution image for your very own.  When you find it in the game you can say \u201cHey, that\u2019s my crud!\u201d (First 3 tiers rewards included)

LEVEL ARCHITECT TIER-\r\nDesign your very own level of Phil The Pill and we\u2019ll include it in the game as a bonus feature for all the world to enjoy! We\u2019ll provide you the same desktop design app we use to create and test our full feature levels and you and your imagination can take it from there.  Your level will be credited with your name or gamer-tag! (First 3 tiers rewards included)

PILLBUG ME-\r\nHave a custom Phil the Pill style Pillbug avatar created of you. Send us a photo and tell us what your defining traits are and we will custom illustrate your very own Pillbug avatar. See our team photos for an example! We will provide a high resolution image as well as standard profile image dimensions for you to use however you'd like. Your avatar will also be featured in the credits of the game with a special thanks. (First 3 tiers rewards included)

DANCE MASTER TIER-\r\nSend us a video of your signature dance move (we promise, we won't show anyone unless you give us permission!) and we will teach it to one of the roly polys. See your dance move in the game when Phil rescues one of the poor little guys. Must be a short non-offensive loopable dance move. (First 3 tiers rewards included)

ARTILLERY AUGMENTER TIER-\r\nDesign a new weapon for Phil the Pill. Name the weapon, tell us what it looks like and what it does and we will create it and put it in the game! Weapon must be balanced and work well within the game mechanic. We will also create a special Pillbug version of you to be featured on our Kickstarter page as well as a special thanks section on the app for your contribution! (All $50 and below rewards included)

PUZZLE MASTER TIER-\r\nConceptualize a new level feature that enhances the puzzle experience! Maybe its a new special block type, or a special powerup. Work with our team to create something that enhances the game! We will also create a special Pillbug version of you to be featured on our Kickstarter page as well as a special thanks section on the app for your contribution! (All $50.00 and below rewards included)

BADDIE DADDY TIER-\r\nConceptualize a new baddie to be featured the game! Work with our team to put your mark on the game and create a fully animated bad guy. We will work with you to determine their backstory and how they got into cohoots with Hank the Stank and his brood. We will also create a special Pillbug version of you to be featured on our Kickstarter page as well as a special thanks section on the app for your contribution! (All $50.00 and below rewards included)
